text:
Had done all my car servicing and repair work with Ellipse Auto Transmission for the past 9 years and they never disappoint me.

Recently i went back again for my regular car servicing and the technician did a check on my car and reminded me that my car battery will need to be replaced soon.

At Ellipse Auto, you are always be assured that service is excellent, price is reasonable and more importantly, you will have a peace of mind when driving your car. Highly recommend!

I did my Diesel car engine overhaul . I like their after service , if any breakdown or issue they reply very fast . I stuck at KL but they guided me to known persons to check immediately. Overall good service . Alvin service is really superb . Highly recommended. All staff is polite and humble .

Nothing much i can say about this shop.
I’ve FINALLY FOUND the best ellipse auto that i can be at ease about my car. THEY ARE THE BEST shop before & after service. Truly the best  ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Sincerely
BMW
Handsome Boy
"Alvin provided excellent professional advice with great patience. The repair was completed efficiently and professionally, coupled with friendly service support from picking and returning vehicle.

I found this Autoshop to be very ethical in both their advice and pricing. They solved an issue which another shop caused to my car and was not willing to fix. I highly recommend them and a special shoutout to Alvin who helped me thru the issues. Will definitely rely on them in the future. Thank you!
